recipesJson.name: Tango Cream
recipesJson.author: DodgerFog33
recipesJson.description: Nice Mango tangerine flavor with a nice sweet creamy vanillla Finish. I wanted to see what I could mix with mango other than peach and this worked out so well. Give this a whirl. You will not be disssapointed.  Sweetener is optional. Taste good off the shake. Steep 3 days for great results.
